languages.text: {n}Когитатор вряд ли когда-нибудь можно будет восстановить, однако ваше внимание привлекает не священная машина, а кинжал, торчащий из панели. На поверку это оказывается изукрашенная гарда меча, у которого выломали лезвие. Навершие гарды украшает странное украшение, напоминающее прикрытый чешуйчатым веком глаз, а остатки лезвия отливают синим — тем же оттенком, что и оружие Кунрада во время бунта на пустотном корабле.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Когитатор вряд ли когда-нибудь можно будет восстановить, однако ваше внимание привлекает не священная машина, а кинжал, торчащий из панели. На поверку это оказывается изукрашенная гарда меча, у которого выломали лезвие. Навершие гарды украшает странное украшение, напоминающее прикрытый чешуйчатым веком глаз, а остатки лезвия отливают синим — тем же оттенком, что и оружие Кунрада во время бунта на пустотном корабле.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The cogitator is probably well beyond repair, but your attention is drawn away from the sacred machine and toward the dagger sticking out of the control panel. On closer inspection, it turns out to be the lavishly decorated handguard of a sword whose blade has been pried out. Its pommel is decorated with a strange adornment resembling an eye covered by a scaled lid. What remains of the blade has a blue sheen to it — the same tint as Kunrad's weapon during the mutiny on your voidship.{/n}

На поверку это оказывается изукрашенная гарда меча, у которого выломали лезвие. Навершие гарды украшает странное украшение, напоминающее прикрытый чешуйчатым веком глаз, а остатки лезвия отливают синим — тем же оттенком, что и оружие Кунрада во время бунта на пустотном корабле.{/n}

On closer inspection, it turns out to be an adorned handguard of a sword whose blade was pried out. Its pommel is decorated with a strange adornment resembling an eye covered by a scaly eyelid. What remains of the blade has a blue sheen to it — the same tint as Kunrad's weapon during the mutiny on your voidship.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Cogitator ist vermutlich nicht mehr zu reparieren, doch deine Aufmerksamkeit wird von der heiligen Maschine weggezogen — auf den Dolch, der aus dem Bedienfeld ragt. Bei näherer Betrachtung entpuppt er sich als verzierter Handschutz eines Schwerts, aus dem die Klinge entfernt wurde. Der Knauf ist mit einer merkwürdigen Dekoration verziert, einem Auge, das von einem geschuppten Augenlid bedeckt ist. Der Überrest der Klinge leuchtet blau. Es ist derselbe Farbton, den Kunrads Waffe während der Meuterei auf deinem Raumschiff ausgestrahlt hat.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cogitator is probably well beyond repair, but your attention is drawn away from the sacred machine and toward the dagger sticking out of the control panel. On closer inspection, it turns out to be the lavishly decorated handguard of a sword whose blade has been pried out. Its pommel is decorated with a strange adornment resembling an eye covered by a scaled lid. What remains of the blade has a blue sheen to it — the same tint as Kunrad's weapon during the mutiny on your voidship.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Cogitator ist vermutlich nicht mehr zu reparieren, doch deine Aufmerksamkeit wird von der heiligen Maschine weggezogen — auf den Dolch, der aus dem Bedienfeld ragt. Bei näherer Betrachtung entpuppt er sich als verzierter Handschutz eines Schwerts, aus dem die Klinge entfernt wurde. Der Knauf ist mit einer merkwürdigen Dekoration verziert, einem Auge, das von einem geschuppten Augenlid bedeckt ist. Der Überrest der Klinge leuchtet blau. Es ist derselbe Farbton, den Kunrads Waffe während der Meuterei auf deinem Raumschiff ausgestrahlt hat.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le cogitateur est sans doute trop endommagé, mais la dague plantée dans le panneau de commandes attire votre attention. En y regardant de plus près, il semble s'agir de la poignée richement ouvragée d'une épée dont la lame a été brisée. Son pommeau est orné d'un motif étrange, semblable à un œil recouvert d'une paupière à écailles. Ce qu'il reste de la lame brille d'un éclat bleuté, la même couleur que l'arme de Kunrad lors de la mutinerie qui a éclaté sur votre vaisseau spatial.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cogitator is probably well beyond repair, but your attention is drawn away from the sacred machine and toward the dagger sticking out of the control panel. On closer inspection, it turns out to be the lavishly decorated handguard of a sword whose blade has been pried out. Its pommel is decorated with a strange adornment resembling an eye covered by a scaled lid. What remains of the blade has a blue sheen to it — the same tint as Kunrad's weapon during the mutiny on your voidship.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le cogitateur est sans doute trop endommagé, mais la dague plantée dans le panneau de commandes attire votre attention. En y regardant de plus près, il semble s'agir de la poignée d'une épée dont la lame a été brisée. Son pommeau est orné d'un motif étrange, semblable à un œil recouvert d'une paupière à écailles. Ce qu'il reste de la lame brille d'un éclat bleuté, la même couleur que l'arme de Kunrad lors de la mutinerie qui a éclaté sur votre vaisseau spatial.{/n}

languages.text: {n}这台沉思者可能已经无法修复了，但比起那台神圣机器本身，插在控制面板的匕首更加吸引了你的注意。你定睛一看，才发现那里只剩下装饰奢华的刀柄，刀刃已经被弹开了。刀刃末端带着奇怪的装饰，看起来像是被鳞状眼睑覆盖的眼睛，残存的刀刃闪着蓝色的光泽。你记得，虚空舰爆发叛乱的时候，昆拉德所用的武器也闪烁着同样的色彩。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cogitator is probably well beyond repair, but your attention is drawn away from the sacred machine and toward the dagger sticking out of the control panel. On closer inspection, it turns out to be the lavishly decorated handguard of a sword whose blade has been pried out. Its pommel is decorated with a strange adornment resembling an eye covered by a scaled lid. What remains of the blade has a blue sheen to it — the same tint as Kunrad's weapon during the mutiny on your voidship.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这台思考器可能已经无法修复了，但比起那台神圣机器本身，插在控制面板的匕首更加吸引了你的注意。你定睛一看，才发现那里只剩下刀柄，刀刃已经被弹开了。刀刃末端带着奇怪的装饰，看起来像是被鳞状眼睑覆盖的眼睛，残存的刀刃闪着蓝色的光泽。你记得，虚空舰爆发叛乱的时候，昆拉德所用的武器也闪烁着同样的色彩。{/n}

languages.text: {n}考算機は、ほぼ確実に修復できないが、神聖なる機械に向かっていた関心が、コントロールパネルから突き出た短剣へと移った。よく見てみると、それは豪華な装飾が施された、刃のない剣の鍔であることが分かる。その柄頭は、鱗で覆われた目を模した奇妙な装飾で飾られている。残った刃の部分は青く煌めいており、ヴォイドシップで起こった反乱でクンラッドが使っていた武器と同じ色合いをしていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cogitator is probably well beyond repair, but your attention is drawn away from the sacred machine and toward the dagger sticking out of the control panel. On closer inspection, it turns out to be the lavishly decorated handguard of a sword whose blade has been pried out. Its pommel is decorated with a strange adornment resembling an eye covered by a scaled lid. What remains of the blade has a blue sheen to it — the same tint as Kunrad's weapon during the mutiny on your voidship.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}考算機は、ほぼ確実に修復できない。だが、神聖なる機械に向かっていた関心は、コントロールパネルから突き出た短剣へと移った。よく見てみると、それは装飾が施された、刃が引き抜かれた剣の鍔であることが分かる。その柄頭は、鱗のまぶたが被った目のような奇妙な装飾で飾られている。残った刃の部分は青くキラキラしていて、ヴォイドシップで起こった反乱でクンラッドが使っていた武器と同じ色合いだった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El cogitador probablemente no tenga arreglo, pero tu atención se desvía de la máquina sagrada y se fija en la daga que sobresale del panel de control. Al mirarlo más de cerca, resulta ser el ostentoso guardamano de una espada cuya hoja fue arrancada. Su empuñadura está decorada con un extraño adorno que se parece a un ojo cubierto por un párpado escamoso. Lo que queda de la hoja tiene un brillo azul, el mismo tono que el arma de Kunrad durante el motín en tu nave del vacío.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cogitator is probably well beyond repair, but your attention is drawn away from the sacred machine and toward the dagger sticking out of the control panel. On closer inspection, it turns out to be the lavishly decorated handguard of a sword whose blade has been pried out. Its pommel is decorated with a strange adornment resembling an eye covered by a scaled lid. What remains of the blade has a blue sheen to it — the same tint as Kunrad's weapon during the mutiny on your voidship.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El cogitador probablemente no tenga arreglo, pero tu atención se desvía de la máquina sagrada y se fija en la daga que sobresale del panel de control. Al mirarlo más de cerca, resulta ser un guardamano adornado de una espada cuya hoja fue arrancada. Su empuñadura está decorada con un extraño adorno que se parece a un ojo cubierto por un párpado escamoso. Lo que queda de la hoja tiene un brillo azul, el mismo tono que el arma de Kunrad durante el motín en tu nave del vacío.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kavramsayar muhtemelen tamir edilemez durumda ancak dikkatin, kutsal makineden kontrol paneline saplanıp kalmış hançere kayıyor. Yakından incelediğinde bunun, bıçağı çıkarılmış ve müsrifçe bezenmiş bir kılıç kabzası olduğunu fark ediyorsun. Topuzundaki sıra dışı süsleme, pullu ve kapalı bir göz kapağını andırıyor. Bıçağından artakalan kısımda mavi bir ışıltı fark ediyorsun. Uçsuz geminde çıkan isyanda Kunrad'ın kullandığı silahın rengiyle aynı ton bu.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cogitator is probably well beyond repair, but your attention is drawn away from the sacred machine and toward the dagger sticking out of the control panel. On closer inspection, it turns out to be the lavishly decorated handguard of a sword whose blade has been pried out. Its pommel is decorated with a strange adornment resembling an eye covered by a scaled lid. What remains of the blade has a blue sheen to it — the same tint as Kunrad's weapon during the mutiny on your voidship.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kavramsayar muhtemelen tamir edilemeyecek durumda. Dikkatin, kutsal makineden kontrol paneline saplanıp kalmış hançere kayıyor. Yakından incelediğinde bunun, bıçağı çıkarılmış ve müsrifçe bezenmiş bir kılıç el koruması olduğunu fark ediyorsun. Topuzundaki sıra dışı süsleme, pullu bir kapak tarafından gölgelenen bir gözü andırıyor. Bıçağından artakalan kısımda mavi bir ışıltı fark ediyorsun. Uçsuz gemisinde çıkan isyanda Kunrad'ın kuşandığı silahın renk tonunun aynısı bu.{/n}
